SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BaseController
The BaseController interface is responsible for setting master variables for all controllers.
Camp
The Camp class represents a camping event, providing information about the camp, its attendees and the committee members.
CampDB
The CampDB class represents a database for managing camps.
CampDetailView
The CampDetailView class is responsible for displaying the details of a specific camp.
CampInformation
The CampInformation class represents information about a camp, including details such as its name, dates, registration information, location and more.
CampListView
The CampListView class is responsible for displaying a list of available camps.
CampOperationsController
The CampOperationsController class is responsible for handling operations related to camp information.
CreateCampView
The CreateCampView class is responsible for interacting with users to create a new camp.
DateConversionHelper
The DateConversionHelper class is responsible for converting a date string into a Date object.
EditCampView
The EditCampView class provides a user interface for editing camp information.
EnquiriesView
The EnquiriesView class is responsible for managing student inquiries and staff interactions.
Enquiry
The Enquiry class represents an enquiry made by a student regarding a camp, along with a response.
EnquiryController
The EnquiryController class is responsible for handling enquiries from users.
EnquiryDB
The EnquiryDB class represents a database for managing camp inquiries.
Faculty
The Faculty enum represents the different schools in the university.
FileHelper
Helper responsible for reading and writing txt file.
InputHelper
Utility class for handling user input.
LoggerHelper
Utility class for logging messages with color-coded output.
LoginView
The LoginView class is responsible for displaying login-related pages and messages.
Main
 
ReportController
The ReportController class is responsible for generating various reports related to camps and student enquiries.
ReportView
The ReportView class is responsible for displaying the camp performance report to staff.
Staff
The Staff class represents a staff user in the system, including the camps that they have created.
Student
The Student class represents a student user in the system, including their registration status for various camps and committee memberships.
StudentCampInteractionController
The StudentCampInteractionController class is responsible for managing student interactions with camps.
Suggestion
Represents a suggestion made by a student regarding a camp, including related information and approval status.
SuggestionController
The SuggestionController class is responsible for managing suggestions related to camps.
SuggestionDB
The SuggestionDB class represents an in-memory database for managing suggestions related to camps.
SuggestionsView
The SuggestionsView class is responsible for managing and displaying suggestions and user interactions.
User
The User class represents a user in the system with a unique user ID, password and faculty.
UserController
The UserController class is responsible for handling user-related operations.
UserDB
The UserDB class represents an in-memory database for managing users, including students and staff.
UserProfileView
The UserProfileView class is responsible for displaying user profiles.
UserType
